item.title: R Syntax in a Nutshell
item.description: Seeking help Numeric Vectors Seeking help Here demonstrate how to seek help in R programing. These keywords include: help(), ?, apropos and example. help(plot) ?plot apropos("plot") #Commands related to "plot" ## [1] "assocplot" "barplot" "barplot.default" ## [4] "biplot" "boxplot" "boxplot.default" ## [7] "boxplot.matrix" "boxplot.stats" "cdplot" ## [10] "coplot" "fourfoldplot" "interaction.plot" ## [13] "lag.plot" "matplot" "monthplot" ## [16] "mosaicplot" "plot" "plot.default" ## [19] "plot.design" "plot.ecdf" "plot.function" ## [22] "plot.
